title: Adamant trimmed armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Adamant trimmed armour is a possible reward from medium Treasure Trails. The set has identical stats to Adamant armour. The armour pieces cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

content:
A player wearing a set of trimmed adamant armour.

Adamant trimmed armour is a possible reward from medium Treasure Trails. The set has identical stats to Adamant armour. The armour pieces cannot be made via the Smithing skill.
